mapper.update: update t_history_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, `type`, type_id, create_time, update_time from t_history_record
